mean_cn: n. 色情描写，色情文学，色情画
mean_en: movies, pictures, magazines, etc., that show or describe naked people or sex in a very open and direct way in order to cause sexual excitement
word_etyma: porno 色情+ graphy 写→ 色情文学, 色情描写
sentence: Pornography should only be accessible to adults.
sentence_trans: 只有成年人才可以观看色情作品。
